description:
From creators of ABC Games featured by the Guardian!

Turn your iPad or iPhone into a fun learning center for your kids. Based on the proven Montessori approach this new free app from Kids Academy opens the door to the exciting world of children's books and songs!

Develop early reading skills, encourage language development, enrich vocabulary, boost cognitive pattern recognition and more through a set of fun educational games.

Here's what's inside

MUST-HAVE KIDS STORIES

An essential collection of children's books loved by generations of kids, parents and teachers:

- Rapunzel
- Puss in Boots
- The Princess and the Pea
- The Three Little Piggies
- Cinderella
- Little Red Riding Hood
- more books added regularly

EVERY STORY BOOK FEATURES:

- Original illustrations on every page
- Professional voice over
- Amusing sound effects
- Age-appropriate content with a happy ending
- Tons of interactive stuff to tap and enjoy

SONGS AND FUN ACTIVITIES

The app features a collection of some of the kids' all time favorite songs. Cute interactive animations, catchy tunes and original music are guaranteed to deliver tons of joy and learning fun:

- Enjoy the iconic Five Little Monkeys and Bingo songs
- Sing along in Karaoke mode
- Record your own songs and stories
- A collection of farm animals cards to play with
- Make up fun animal stories and have them recorded

Over 20 million kids have fun learning with Kids Academy apps! Join the club!
